text: Dorling may refer to: *Dorling Kindersley, UK-founded international publishing company ==People with the surname== *Christopher Dorling (retired 1987), co- founder of Dorling Kindersley publishers *Danny Dorling (born 1968), British geographer *George Dorling (1918 – 1987), English footballer *Henry Dorling (died 1873), First clerk of Epsom racecourse and stepfather of Mrs Beeton *Lionel Dorling (1860 - 1925), British Army officer *Philip Dorling (active 2008 - ), Australian writer *T.J. Dorling, designer of Scorpion (dinghy)
title: Dorling
